DisplayWindow class responsible for human IO and graphics display
Display.Display.HumanBlockerSubclass to synchronize human player actions
GameControllerCoordinates the game classes and runs the game

GameState_Opt7x6Representation of a game of Connect Four optimized for the traditional 7x6 board size
